item.title: Lessons learned from a kernel bisection
item.description: [][1]I’m far from being a kernel developer, but I found myself staring down a [peculiar touchpad problem][2] with my new Dell XPS 13.

item.title: Using git clean to remove subdirectories containing git repositories
item.description: I had a peculiar situation today where I cloned a repository into a directory which was inside another repository.

item.title: DNS Service Review: Luadns
item.description: Vitalie Cherpec contacted me back in May about his new hosted DNS offering, Luadns.

item.title: Compare commits between two git branches
item.description: I found myself stuck in a particularly nasty situation a few weeks ago where I had two git branches with some commits that were mixed up.

item.title: OpenStack bleeding-edge Python packages are now available
item.description: I sometimes enjoy living on the edge occasionally and that sometimes means I keep up with OpenStack changes commit by commit.
